title: Hand Engraved Samples & Press Proofs in VOGUE's Blog
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023043312im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ideas_justfacts_4754.gif)

"Need to Know" section of Vogue magazine's online zine by Stephanie LaCava and edited by Virginia Tupker, [http://www.style.com/vogue/voguedaily/2009/10/need-it-now-nancy-sharon-c...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023043312/http:/www.style.com/vogue/voguedaily/2009/10/need-it-now-nancy-sharon-collins-stationery-samples/ "http://www.style.com/vogue/voguedaily/2009/10/need-it-now-nancy-sharon-collins-stationery-samples/").

This features re-purposed, vintage, hand engraved dies. They are goofy and some with nifty old type.
author: nancy sharon collins
